scripts.fetch_submodules: git submodule update --force --init --recursive && git submodule update --force --recursive --remote
scripts.add_dependencies: npm install && concurrently "cd ForteERP-API-admin && npm install" "cd ForteERP-API-global && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "pm2 start ForteERP-API-global/dist/index.js -n global" "pm2 start ForteERP-API-admin/dist/index.js -n admin"
scripts.prod: concurrently "pm2 start ForteERP-API-global/index.js -n global" "pm2 start ForteERP-API-admin/index.js -n admin"
